title: The execution order doesn't work correctly when you use the REPLACE function in the Manage Persons API
content:
The execution order doesn't work correctly when you use the REPLACE function in the Manage Persons API.

Cause

The Manage Persons API works asynchronously and there's no guarantee for the execution order of concurrent jobs. Using the REPLACE function to delete and add people's organizational group data might set the OrganizationalGroup field and other relevant fields to an unexpected value.

Solution

Update the tenant settings by configuring the waiting time between steps for replacing organizational group data. To do this, follow these steps:

Configure the waiting mode

  1. Open Postman and click + in the workbench to open a new tab.
  2. Change the method to PUT and enter the Tenant Settings API for the request URL in the following format:
    https://<External Access Host>/rest/<tenant ID>/common-settings/setting/<tenant settings key>?value=<tenant setting value>

    The tenant settings key REPLACE_ORG_GROUP_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_MODE configures the waiting mode between steps for replacing persons' organizational group information by Manage Persons API. The following four values are valid:

    • None: Skip the steps for configuring the waiting mode.
    • Fixed: Wait for the time equal to the value of REPLACE_ORG_GROUP_TRANSACTION_AWAITING_TIMEOUT.
    • Multiplied: Wait for the time equal to the value of REPLACE_ORG_GROUP_TRANSACTION_AWAITING_TIMEOUT multiplied by the total amount of relationships between persons and groups that are removed in this request.
    • Dynamical: Wait until all the OrganizationalGroup fields of persons that need to be replaced in this request become empty or until it reaches the time configured for REPLACE_ORG_GROUP_TRANSACTION_AWAITING_TIMEOUT. In the latter case, you need to manually identify and update the OrganizationalGroup fields for the records that encountered a timeout.
  3. Click Send.

    Example:

Configure the waiting timeout value

Use Postman to send another PUT request with the REPLACE_ORG_GROUP_TRANSACTION_AWAITING_TIMEOUT tenant settings key. This key configures the time when the system stops replacing the OrganizationalGroup fields by Manage Persons API. The value range is between 0 to 1800, in seconds.
